scripts.lhci-autorun-override: export LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__CURRENT_HASH=$(node -e "console.log(require('crypto').createHash('md5').update(Date.now().toString() + Math.random().toString()).digest('hex'))") && LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__COMMIT_MESSAGE=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__AUTHOR='tseronisk' LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__AVATAR_URL='N\A' LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__COMMIT_TIME=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.000Z") npx lhci autorun
scripts.lhci-autorun-override-debug: export LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__CURRENT_HASH=$(node -e "console.log(require('crypto').createHash('md5').update(Date.now().toString() + Math.random().toString()).digest('hex'))") && LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__COMMIT_MESSAGE=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__AUTHOR='tseronisk' LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__AVATAR_URL='N\A' LHCI_BUILD_CONTEXT__COMMIT_TIME=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.000Z") npx lhci autorun --debug
